document.full_text: billionaire hedge fund manager john paulson is off to a mixed start to the year as his biggest portfolios posted losses during the first three months, two people familiar with the performance said.
document.title: paulson's biggest hedge funds post losses in first quarter
lines_and_colors: billionaire hedge fund manager john paulson is off to a mixed start to the year as his biggest portfolios posted losses during the first three months, two people familiar with the performance said.
